Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I’m just wondering if anyone knows why some people have “FEC” and some have “EC” I was told first I was having fec and then was changed to EC.. does anyone know the difference? Has anyone who had ec feel like the chemos get easier ? My first one was really hard .. but after a week I feel normal again.  Did everyone loose all brows and lashes ?  Thanks xxx
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: Thanks a lot lovely, that was really helpful xx good news about lashes and brows I thought was a given through chemo!!  Thanks coley xx
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: Hi, I had my first  ec 2 1/2 weeks ago and cold capped... my hair is everywhere it’s not going bald in any patches but it’s definitely thinning :( it’s the most horrendous feeling I can see why people just shave :(  if it’s coming out it’s normally day 17 from first chemo .. so if you aren’t falling out yet there’s a good chance it won’t was your hair really wet before the cap went on? Xxx
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I’m 25 and just about to do my 3rd out of 6 EC chemos. I’m Grade 3, 21mm ER+ no effected nodes and oncotype of 18. I had a double mastectomy and clear margins. I really hate chemo I felt so strong before but chemo is making me feel so poorly and sad, the cold cap isn’t working. I have heart palpitations, trouble breathing and sickness is unbearable! I’m considering stopping my chemo and going straight on tamoxifen as apparently all my cancer is gone and this is just precaution. Has anyone else found themselves in a similar situation and stopped adjuvant chemo? Will 2 chemos make any difference ?  Thanks xxx
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: I see her on nye so I’ll have a chat with her then, I know she will say I need them but I think I struggle with the fact it can still come back after all this ... i would kick myself if I wasted my  20’s bald sad and no life for for a year for it to come back anyway. I would also panic if I didn’t do the chemos and blame myself if it came back. It’s just the worst thing having your life threatened isn’t it .. there’s never a straight answer in the cancer world from doctors that’s what I struggle with!  What made you struggle with letrazol ???  Thanks girls xxxx
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: Aww thanks girls,  It’s so hard, I cried through my second chemo too it’s the fear of knowing what’s coming and the slow red coming down that tube   The nurses thought was the cold cap but really I was just scared of the chemo haha. i also have complete baldness on the back of my head and thinning at the top :( I know everyone says it grows back but it’s so traumatic seeing it slowly fall out and knowing all them painful hours were for nothing ! I don’t think I’ll ever be able to shave it off even the patch at the back makes me feel creeped out.  I’ve used something called “just nutrive - grow new hair “ before this for thickening up my hairline and it was amazing really worked, it won’t work while having treatment but I’ve stocked up on shampoo and the growing oil for when I finish. It’s not cheap but really works .. sooner it comes back the better haha! I wish I had chemo first to be honest so I could feel the Tumour shrinking to give me the incentive, it’s too easy to stop when it’s preventing (and can still come back) its a lot to go through Xxx
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***
